# point

**Instance Property**

The x and y position to use as the center of the triangular area in the input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var point: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **decay**: A value that determines how fast the color fades from the center triangle.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **rotation**: The rotation angle of the triangle.
- **size**: The size, in pixels, of the triangle.
